titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford University, Post Office, photographs
titlestmt.author: Jenny Johnson

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Photographs and negatives of the old Stanford Post Office and the dedication of the new Post Office on February 11, 1960.
did.physloc: Special Collections and University Archives materials are stored offsite and must be paged 36-48 hours in advance. For more information on paging collections, see the department's website: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/spc.html.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94305-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [identification of item], Stanford University, Post Office, photographs (PC0038). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical note
bioghist.p: The old Stanford post office was demolished for the construction of Dinkelspiel Auditorium. The new Stanford Post Office was designed by John Carl Warnecke and dedicated in 1960.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Photographs and negatives of the old Stanford Post Office and the dedication of the new Post Office on February 11, 1960.
